bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Pathological Condition of cu si 卒死 , sudden [appearance of] death, while one is asleep. Ben cao gang mu 本草綱目 Substance Entry ji 雞 quoting Zhou hou bei ji fang 肘後備急方 1: 救卒死，或先病痛，或常居寢臥，奄忽而絕，皆 是中死 , “For sudden [appearance of death] either following prior disease and pain, or after a normal life while asleep, with a sudden cut-off, these all are cases of a fatal strike”, writes: 卒死寢死：治卒死，或寢臥奄忽而絕，皆是中惡 , “Sudden [appearance of] death and [appearance of] death while asleep : When treating sudden [appearance of] death, which may be a sudden cut-off during sleep, these all are cases of being struck by the malign”.
